sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

sentences.english: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

sentences.english: temporary pain relief
sentences.chinese: 疼痛的暂时缓解

sentences.english: I’m living with my parents, but it’s only temporary.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母住在一起，但这只是暂时的。

sentences.english: You might want to consider temporary work until you decide what you want to do.
sentences.chinese: 在你定下来想做什么之前，也许可以考虑干点临时性工作。

sentences.english: She was employed on a temporary basis .
sentences.chinese: 她是受雇干临时性工作的。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a limited period of time

sentences.english: Is anything wrong? You look a little tense.
sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.english: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

detailed_translations.english: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force

sentences.english: There was a look of sheer terror (= complete terror ) on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上的表情异常惊恐。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of extreme fear

sentences.english: We refuse to talk to terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 我们拒绝和恐怖分子对话。

sentences.english: a terrorist bomb that left 168 people dead
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子引爆造成168人死亡的炸弹

detailed_translations.english: someone who uses violence such as bombing, shooting etc to obtain political demands

sentences.english: Did you get a good mark in the test?
sentences.chinese: 你这次测验成绩好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge
to examine a substance or thing in order to find out its qualities or what it contains

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

sentences.english: I haven’t had a chance to thank him yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有机会向他表示谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are pleased and grateful for something they have done, or to be polite about it
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something

sentences.english: ‘You never cared about me.’ ‘That’s not true.’
sentences.chinese: “你从不关心我。”“那不是事实。”

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn’t say things like that.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要那么说。

sentences.english: What did you do with those sandwiches?
sentences.chinese: 那些三明治你怎么处理了？

sentences.english: Victoria Street? That’s where my sister lives.
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚街？我的姐姐就住在那儿。

sentences.english: Do you remember that nice Mr Hoskins who came to dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你还记得那位来这儿吃过晚饭的好人霍斯金斯先生吗？

sentences.english: I’ve got that pain in my back again.
sentences.chinese: 我的背又疼起来了。

sentences.english: He killed a man once and that’s why he had to leave Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 他曾杀死过一个人，这就是他不得不离开爱尔兰的原因。

sentences.english: ‘We’ve been cheated,’ she said. Those were her exact words.
sentences.chinese: “我们被骗了。”她说。这是她的原话。

sentences.english: ‘I have to go,’ she said, and with that (= after saying that ) she hung up the phone.
sentences.chinese: “我得走了。”说完她就把电话挂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 那，那个〔指已经提到或已经知道的人、事物、想法等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔用于动词、名词或形容词后引导一个从句，表示某人所说或所想，或陈述一个事实或理由〕
detailed_translations.english: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 那么〔大、多等〕〔尤指通过手势比画来表示大小、数量等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, especially when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: He described the scene to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我描述了那个情景。

sentences.english: He telegraphed me to go to the party.
sentences.chinese: 他发电报要我去参加那个聚会。

sentences.english: The world exists, whether you like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管你喜欢与否，这个世界照样存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更加（用于比较级，最高级前）
detailed_translations.english: used before two  comparative  adjectives or adverbs to show that the degree of one event or situation is related to the degree of another one

sentences.english: It ushered in the new theater season.
sentences.chinese: 它预示了新的戏剧旺季的来临。

sentences.english: The theater emptied when the movie ended.
sentences.chinese: 电影结束了， 剧院里的人就走空了。

sentences.english: You know, like fencing, or theater or something.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，像是击剑，戏剧表演或什么的。

sentences.english: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.english: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.chinese: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.english: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
sentences.chinese: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘him or her’

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

sentences.english: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.chinese: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.english: Are these all yours?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是你的吗?

sentences.english: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.chinese: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

sentences.english: a thin gold chain
sentences.chinese: 一条细细的金链

sentences.english: She’s only wearing a thin summer jacket (= a jacket made of light material ) .
sentences.chinese: 她只穿了一件薄薄的夏装外套。

sentences.english: two thin slices of bread
sentences.chinese: 薄薄的两片面包

sentences.english: The road was covered with a thin layer of ice.
sentences.chinese: 路面上覆盖着一层薄薄的冰。

sentences.english: The skin on the eyelids is the thinnest on the body.
sentences.chinese: 眼睑上的皮肤是人体最薄的皮肤。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thin, there is only a small distance between its two opposite sides or surfaces
Thin out means the same as
Thin out means the same as

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

sentences.english: Divide it into thirds.
sentences.chinese: 把它分成三等份。

detailed_translations.english: one of three equal parts of something
coming after two other things in a series

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you will cause someone harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

sentences.english: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.chinese: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

detailed_translations.english: if two players, teams etc tie or are tied in a game or competition, they finish it with an equal number of points

detailed_translations.chinese: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

sentences.english: He looks tired out (= very tired ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看起来累坏了。

sentences.english: ‘No,’ Frank said in a tired voice.
sentences.chinese: “不。”弗兰克语带疲倦地说。

detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want to sleep or rest

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: I couldn’t go shopping yesterday so I’ll have to go today.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

sentences.english: Ed has his music lesson today.
sentences.chinese: 埃德今天有音乐课。

detailed_translations.english: on the day that is happening now
the day that is happening now

sentences.english: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: I’ll see you at tomorrow’s meeting.
sentences.chinese: 明天会上见。

detailed_translations.english: the day after today
on or during the day after today

sentences.english: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.english: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

detailed_translations.english: during the night of this day
the night of this day

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.english: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.chinese: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.english: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆太多。

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

sentences.english: a low wooden table with a glass top
sentences.chinese: 玻璃桌面的矮木桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 顶部，顶端；上部；首席；陀螺
detailed_translations.english: the highest part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 高出，超越；结束；达到顶点
detailed_translations.english: to be higher than a particular amount
nearest to the top of something

sentences.english: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.chinese: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

sentences.english: The waiting must be torture for you.
sentences.chinese: 这样的等待对你来说肯定是一种煎熬。

sentences.english: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
sentences.chinese: 这个政权的政治异己可能会遭受酷刑。

detailed_translations.english: an act of deliberately hurting someone in order to force them to tell you something, to punish them, or to be cruel
to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel

sentences.english: a total ban on cigarette advertising
sentences.chinese: 香烟广告的全面禁止

sentences.english: He looked at her with a total lack of comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 他一头雾水地望着她。

sentences.english: a sport that demands total commitment
sentences.chinese: 需要全身心投入的体育运动

detailed_translations.english: complete, or as great as is possible
to reach a particular total

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

sentences.english: The parents were not to blame for the tragic death of their son.
sentences.chinese: 儿子的惨死不是他父母的错。

sentences.english: a great tragic actor
sentences.chinese: 一名伟大的悲剧演员

detailed_translations.english: making you feel very sad, usually because sb has died or suffered a lot

sentences.english: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.chinese: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine
to teach someone the skills of a particular job or activity, or to be taught these skills

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

sentences.english: Mr Smith has walked straight into a trap laid by the Tories.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生直接落入了保守党布设的圈套。

sentences.english: He felt he had been trapped into accepting the terms of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得自己是中了圈套才接受这合同条款的。

sentences.english: Were you just trying to trap her into making some admission?
sentences.chinese: 你仅仅是在试图诱骗她招供吗？

detailed_translations.english: a clever trick that is used to catch someone or to make them do or say something that they did not intend to
to trick sb into sth

sentences.english: Light travels faster than sound.
sentences.chinese: 光比声音传播得快。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行； 行进； 被传送， 被传播； 走过， 驶过
detailed_translations.english: to move at a particular speed or in a particular direction
the activity of travelling

sentences.english: The defendant was convicted of high treason (= treason of the worst kind ) and sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 被告被判犯有严重叛国罪，并处以死刑。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of being disloyal to your country or its government, especially by helping its enemies or trying to remove the government using violence

sentences.english: buried treasure
sentences.chinese: 埋藏的财宝

sentences.english: the priceless art treasures of the Uffizi gallery.
sentences.chinese: 乌菲齐美术馆收藏的无价艺术瑰宝

sentences.english: I treasure his friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我珍重他的友谊。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of valuable things such as gold, silver and jewellery
to keep and care for something that is very special, important, or valuable to you

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

sentences.english: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.english: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.chinese: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

sentences.english: Both sides have agreed to sign the treaty .
sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.chinese: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 条约， 协议， 协定
detailed_translations.english: a formal written agreement between two or more countries or governments

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

sentences.english: a tribe of Aborigines known as the Dolphin People
sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

detailed_translations.english: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.english: The trick is to bend your knees as you catch the ball.
sentences.chinese: 诀窍是接球时要屈膝。

sentences.english: She knew she’d been tricked, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己被骗了，但为时已晚。

detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to deceive someone
to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: They agreed to call a truce .
sentences.chinese: 他们同意宣布休战。

detailed_translations.english: an agreement between enemies to stop fighting or arguing for a short time, or the period for which this is arranged

sentences.english: a truck driver
sentences.chinese: 卡车司机

detailed_translations.english: a large road vehicle used to carry goods

sentences.english: No, honestly, it’s a true story .
sentences.chinese: 不，真的，这是一个真实的故事。

sentences.english: Students decide if statements are true or false .
sentences.chinese: 由学生来判断说法正确还是错误。

sentences.english: It’s generally true to say that fewer people are needed nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说现在需要的人员少了。

sentences.english: The results appear to hold true (= still be correct ) for other countries.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果在其他国家似乎同样正确。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts and not imagined or invented

sentences.english: At first there was a lack of trust between them.
sentences.chinese: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.english: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.chinese: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.english: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.chinese: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.english: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

detailed_translations.english: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

sentences.english: a tube of toothpaste
sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.english: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

sentences.english: She doesn’t understand English.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to know the meaning of what someone is telling you, or the language that they speak

sentences.english: Our goal is to unite the opposition parties and defeat the President.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是联合各反对党挫败总统。

detailed_translations.english: if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something
if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.chinese: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.english: He waited until she had finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他一直等到她讲完。

sentences.english: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.english: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.chinese: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.english: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

detailed_translations.english: towards a higher place or position
If you are up, you are not in bed

sentences.english: The charity urged quick action.
sentences.chinese: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

sentences.english: I got a note from Moira urging me to get in touch.
sentences.chinese: 我收到莫伊拉的一封短信，一定要我保持联系。

detailed_translations.english: to strongly suggest that someone does something

sentences.english: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.chinese: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.english: an urgent message
sentences.chinese: 一封急报

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

sentences.english: Please help us.
sentences.chinese: 请帮助我们。

sentences.english: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。

sentences.english: She’s invited us both.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩她都请了。

sentences.english: My mother is coming to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 我妈要来和我们同住。

sentences.english: Send us a donation now.
sentences.chinese: 现在就给我们捐款吧。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.english: Can I use your phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.english: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.chinese: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.english: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.english: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.chinese: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.english: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.chinese: 她用化名预订了航班。

detailed_translations.english: if you use a particular tool, method, service, ability etc, you do something with that tool, by means of that method etc, for a particular purpose

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用， 应用； 用途， 效用
detailed_translations.english: the action or fact of using something

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

detailed_translations.english: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

sentences.english: a polio vaccine
sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.english: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.chinese: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance which contains a weak form of the bacteria or virus that causes a disease and is used to protect people from that disease

sentences.english: the San Fernando Valley
sentences.chinese: 圣费尔南多山谷

detailed_translations.english: an area of lower land between two lines of hills or mountains, usually with a river flowing through it

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

sentences.english: fresh fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 新鲜果蔬

sentences.english: organic methods of growing vegetables
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜的有机种植方法

sentences.english: vegetable soup
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜汤

sentences.english: a neat vegetable garden
sentences.chinese: 整洁的菜园

sentences.english: Vitamin A is found in liver and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 动物肝脏和绿色蔬菜中含有维生素A。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that is eaten raw or cooked, such as a cabbage, a carrot, or peas
relating to plants in general, rather than animals or things that are not living

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.chinese: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

detailed_translations.english: a way of explaining or doing something that is typical of a particular group or period of time

sentences.english: It feels very cold today.
sentences.chinese: 今天很冷。

sentences.english: The fishing industry is very important to the area.
sentences.chinese: 捕鱼业对于该地区非常重要。

sentences.english: The traffic’s moving very slowly this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上车流非常缓慢。

sentences.english: problems that are very similar to mine
sentences.chinese: 和我非常相似的问题

sentences.english: I feel a lot better – thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好多了，非常感谢。

sentences.english: I’m very, very (= used for emphasis ) pleased you can come.
sentences.chinese: 你能来我真是非常高兴。

sentences.english: It’s very kind of you to help.
sentences.chinese: 您来帮忙真是太好了。

sentences.english: My sister and I were married on the very same (= exactly the same ) day.
sentences.chinese: 我和姐姐在同一天结婚。

sentences.english: He died in this very room.
sentences.chinese: 他就是在这个房间里去世的。

sentences.english: I’ll start at the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我要从头开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an adjective, adverb, or phrase
used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: Union leaders are heading for victory in their battle over workplace rights.
sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you win a battle, game, election, or dispute

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: There is too much sex and violence on TV these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今电视上性爱和暴力场面太多。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is intended to hurt other people physically

sentences.english: I was still in New York, trying to get a visa to visit Russia.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在纽约，正在办理去俄罗斯的签证。

detailed_translations.english: an official mark put on your passport that gives you permission to temporarily enter or leave a foreign country

sentences.english: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

detailed_translations.english: to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.chinese: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava is sometimes forced out

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

sentences.english: Please wire me when you arrive.
sentences.chinese: 你到达后请打电报给我。

sentences.english: He got a wire to go home.
sentences.chinese: 他接到一封让他回家的电报。

detailed_translations.english: to send money electronically
thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

sentences.english: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.chinese: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.english: married women
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女

sentences.english: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.english: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.chinese: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female person

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 5点以后交通拥堵严重得多。

sentences.english: The weather was a lot worse this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.english: Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.chinese: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.english: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.chinese: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.english: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.chinese: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.english: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.chinese: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.english: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.english: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级）
detailed_translations.english: more unpleasant, bad, or severe

detailed_translations.chinese: 更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地
detailed_translations.english: in a more severe or serious way than before
something worse

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: Divers discovered the wreck of an old German warship.
sentences.chinese: 潜水员发现了一艘沉没的德国旧军舰。

sentences.english: Injury threatened to wreck his sporting career.
sentences.chinese: 伤病可能会毁了他的运动生涯。

detailed_translations.english: a ship that has sunk
to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way

sentences.english: Firemen managed to pull some survivors from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员设法从残骸中拖出了几名幸存者。

detailed_translations.chinese: （失事船或飞机等的）残骸；（船只等的）失事
detailed_translations.english: the parts of something such as a plane, ship, or building that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: yellow flowers
sentences.chinese: 黄花

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
to become yellow or make something become yellow

sentences.english: ‘Would you like a sandwich?’ ‘Yes, please.’
sentences.chinese: “你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.chinese: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

detailed_translations.english: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

sentences.english: yesterday’s meeting
sentences.chinese: 昨天的会议

sentences.english: They arrived the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他们前天到的。

detailed_translations.english: the day before today
on or during the day before today

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.english: a young child
sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.english: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
young people

sentences.english: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.chinese: 设x大于或等于零。

detailed_translations.english: the number 0
the number 0

sentences.english: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
